GDAD-POC-KEY.name: gdad_poc
GDAD-POC-KEY.description: Contains Policies and all the other sharding compartments

GDAD-POC-NETWORKS-KEY.name: gdad_poc_networks
GDAD-POC-NETWORKS-KEY.description: Contains VNC, Subnets, Routing Rules, Sec Lists, DRGs, Service Gateways, External Bastion

GDAD-POC-DATABASES-KEY.name: gdad_poc_databases
GDAD-POC-DATABASES-KEY.description: Autonomous Databases and Autonomous Container Databases

GDAD-POC-CERT-VAULT-KEYS-KEY.name: gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys
GDAD-POC-CERT-VAULT-KEYS-KEY.description: Certificate Authorities, Certificate Bundles, Certificates, Vaults, and Keys

CERTIFICATE-AUTHORITY-ADMINS-KEY.name: CertificateAuthorityAdmins
CERTIFICATE-AUTHORITY-ADMINS-KEY.description: Purpose of this group is to manage certificate-authority-family

CERTIFICATE-AUTHORITY-POLICY-KEY.name: CertificateAuthority-Policy
CERTIFICATE-AUTHORITY-POLICY-KEY.description: Allow certificate authorities to use keys in this compartment gdad_poc_mesh
statements: allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_certificate_authority_group to use keys in compartment gdad_poc_mesh
allow dynamic-group gdad-poc-certificate-authority-group to manage objects in compartment gdad_poc_mesh

GDAD-POC-VIEW-VAULT-KEY.name: gdad-poc-view-vault
statements: allow service keymanagementservice to manage vaults in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys

GDAD-POC-EXADATA-COMPARTMENT-ACCESS-VAUL.name: gdad-poc-exadata-compartment-access-vault-and-keys
GDAD-POC-EXADATA-COMPARTMENT-ACCESS-VAUL.description: poc exadata vaults and keys policies
statements: allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_cluster_compartment_resources to manage keys in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys
allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_cluster_compartment_resources to read vaults in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys

GDAD-POC-ACCESS-VAULT-AND-KEYS-KEY.name: gdad-poc-access-vault-and-keys
GDAD-POC-ACCESS-VAULT-AND-KEYS-KEY.description: PoC General vaults and keys policies
statements: Allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_certificate_authority_group to use keys in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys
Allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_certificate_authority_group to manage objects in compartment gdad_poc_mesh

GDAD-POC-CERTIFICATE-ADMIN-KEY.name: gdad-poc-certificate-admin
GDAD-POC-CERTIFICATE-ADMIN-KEY.description: Allow certificate admin to manage certificate-authority-family
statements: Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins to manage certificate-authority-family in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys
Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins to read keys in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys
Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins to use key-delegate in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys
Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins to read buckets in compartment gdad_poc_mesh
Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins to read vaults in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys
